data.comment: The big names in today's match at Nabizao have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Nabizao.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Recife PE at Nabizao.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 4, Bragantino drive forward but Claudinho is judged offside.
Free kick Recife PE.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 5, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 7, Thiago Neves for Recife PE drives towards goal at Nabizao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Aderlan (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 13, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Recife PE throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 15, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 17, Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 18, Recife PE needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Nabizao.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 23, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 24, Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 25, Recife PE have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
Thiago Neves of Recife PE smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 28, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Recife PE throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 31, Bragantino push forward at Nabizao and Claudinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Recife PE's area.
Bragantino are pushing forward but Artur's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Recife PE will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bragantino.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 39, Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Bragantino drive upfield and Ytalo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Bragantino's Claudinho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 41, Recife PE have a goal kick.
In Braganca Paulista, Artur of Bragantino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 42, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Bragantino throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Nabizao.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first half has been concluded at Nabizao.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Bragantino are coming forward and Ricardo Ryller gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 47, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Recife PE at Nabizao.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Ricardo Ryller puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Attention is being given to Bragantinoâ€™s Weverson and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Edimar (Bragantino) has replaced the possibly injured Weverson at Nabizao.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Nabizao.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 61, It's now 2-0 in Braganca Paulista as Claudinho scores for Bragantino.
Great play from Ytalo to set up the goal.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a first substitution, with Mikael replacing Ricardinho.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 66, Ricardo Ryller for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, In Braganca Paulista Bragantino attack through Bruno Tubarao. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Nabizao.
Marcao Silva is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Bragantino throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 70, The match at Nabizao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bruno Tubarao, who is down injured.
The away team replace Marcao Silva with Ronaldo.
Rogerio is on a sub for Marquinhos for Recife PE.
In the minute 73, Bruno Tubarao for Bragantino is back on the field again.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Recife PE's area.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Bragantino.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro waits before resuming play because Claudinho for Bragantino is still down.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Bragantino make their second substitution with Tomas Cuello replacing Artur.
Claudinho (Bragantino) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Luis Phelipe.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Nabizao.
In the minute 81, Daniel Paulista is making the team's fourth substitution at Nabizao with Junior Tavares replacing Leandro Barcia.
Jonathan Gomez is replacing Thiago Neves for Recife PE at Nabizao.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Recife PE at Nabizao.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Recife PE.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Free kick in a good position for Bragantino!
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Recife PE.
Important block from the Bragantino defence as Jonathan Gomez fires in a strike for Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 87, Bragantino's Bruno Tubarao gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jan Hurtado is replacing Ytalo for the home team.
In the minute 88, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
The home team have replaced Ricardo Ryller with Uillian Correia. This is the fifth substitution made today by Mauricio Barbieri.
Jan Hurtado of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 89, Free kick Recife PE.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Recife PE throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Nabizao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Bragantino.
Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Lucas Mugni gets his shot on target but fails to score for Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Recife PE's Lucas Mugni gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Bragantino.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Bragantino's Jan Hurtado has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Iago Maidana (Recife PE) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Aderlan (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
